snippet: A selection of 14th-century parables reworked by the Chinese government to encourage parental devotion in modern times.
lead_paragraph: A selection of 14th-century parables reworked by the Chinese government to encourage parental devotion in modern times.

headline.seo: Filial Piety: From Strangling Tigers to Taming the Internet
